snippet: The weapons were sold amid growing concerns across North Africa that instability and the rise of jihadist groups in Libya could spread to neighboring countries.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande announces that Egypt will purchase nearly $6 billion worth of military hardware from France, including two dozen fighter jets and naval frigate.
lead_paragraph: The weapons were sold amid growing concerns across North Africa that instability and the rise of jihadist groups in Libya could spread to neighboring countries.

headline.main: Egypt to Purchase Fighter Jets and a Warship From France
headline.print_headline: Egypt to Purchase Fighter Jets and a Warship From France
